## 📝 Scenario:

You're analyzing responses from 10 students about their **willingness to donate organs** and their **academic year**.

\`\`\`r donation \<- c("Yes", "No", "Yes", "Maybe", "No", "Yes", "No", "Yes", "Yes", "No") year \<- c("First", "Third", "Second", "Fifth", "Third", "Second", "First", "Fourth", "Fifth", "Third")
